headline: Oil Prices Rally 5% On Trump; Two Oil Plays Makes Bullish Earnings Moves
summary: U.S. oil prices soared more than 5%, hitting two-week highs early Thursday on Trump administration moves.  West Texas Intermediate crude oil futures jumped Thursday after the U.S. announced sanctions on key Russian oil companies.  President Donald Trump also said he would put pressure on major buyers and plans to discuss Russian oil imports with China President Xi Jinping next week.

headline: Valero Energy Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: SAN ANTONIO, October 23, 2025--Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE: VLO, "Valero") today reported net income attributable to Valero stockholders of $1.1 billion, or $3.53 per share, for the third quarter of 2025, compared to net income of $364 million, or $1.14 per share, for the third quarter of 2024. Excluding the adjustments shown in the accompanying earnings release tables, adjusted net income attributable to Valero stockholders was $1.1 billion, or $3.66 per share, for the third quarter of 2025

raw.headline: Valero Energy Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results
raw.summary: SAN ANTONIO, October 23, 2025--Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE: VLO, "Valero") today reported net income attributable to Valero stockholders of $1.1 billion, or $3.53 per share, for the third quarter of 2025, compared to net income of $364 million, or $1.14 per share, for the third quarter of 2024. Excluding the adjustments shown in the accompanying earnings release tables, adjusted net income attributable to Valero stockholders was $1.1 billion, or $3.66 per share, for the third quarter of 2025
